title: Global HRD Training Program Design: Applying Culturally Adapted Pedagogical Approaches

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Organizational Management and HRD (Human Resource Development) Concepts
context.additional_context: Focuses on designing training programs considering cultural diversity, with enhanced case analysis utilizing learners' practical experiences.

learning_goals: Learners can design HRD training content that reflects cultural differences.
Learners can apply effective delivery techniques for training programs targeting U.S. and non-U.S. audiences.
Learners can develop training models applicable to real-world work environments through project-based assessment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
